languages.text: "В новинку все, но люди постоянно приходят и с молитвою, и за советом, и в святилище исповедей всякого накопилось — не остается времени на глубокие думы. А я ж всех знаю, со многими беседовал на духовные темы. Кажись, паства меня в сане приняла быстрее, чем я себя".

traits.locale_text: "В новинку все, но люди постоянно приходят и с молитвою, и за советом, и в святилище исповедей всякого накопилось — не остается времени на глубокие думы. А я ж всех знаю, со многими беседовал на духовные темы. Кажись, паства меня в сане приняла быстрее, чем я себя".

languages.text: "It's all new to me, but people are always stopping by for prayer and counsel, and the shrine confessional is packed to the brim — I just haven't had any time to take everything in. But I know everyone and have spoken on spiritual matters with many crewmen. I guess they've accepted me in ordination faster than I've accepted myself."
languages.original_text: "В новинку все, но люди постоянно приходят и с молитвою, и за советом, и в святилище исповедей всякого накопилось — не остается времени на глубокие думы. А я ж всех знаю, со многими беседовал на духовные темы. Кажись, паства меня в сане приняла быстрее, чем я себя".

traits.locale_text: "It's all new to me, but people are always stopping by for prayer and counsel, and the shrine confessional is packed to the brim — I just haven't had any time to take everything in. But I know everyone and have spoken on spiritual matters with many crewmen. I guess they've accepted me in ordination faster than I've accepted myself."

"Everything is new, but people are always coming in for prayer and council, and the confession machine is packed to the brim, so there is not much time for reflection. But I know everyone, I have conversed on spiritual matters with so many people. It seems that the flock has accepted me in ordination faster than I have accepted myself."

"Everything is new, but people are always coming in for prayer and council. Plus, the confession machine is packed to the brim, so there is not much time for reflection. But I know everyone and have conversed on spiritual matters with many people. It seems that the flock has accepted me in ordination faster than I have accepted myself."

"Everything is new, but people are always coming in for prayer and council. Plus, the confession machine is packed to the brim, so there is not much time for reflection. But I know everyone and have conversed on spiritual matters with many people. It seems that the flock has accepted me in ordination faster than I have accepted myself."

"It's all new to me, but people are always stopping by for prayer and counsel, and the shrine confessional is packed to the brim — I just haven't had any time to take everything in. But I know everyone and have spoken on spiritual matters with many crewmen. I guess they've accepted me in ordination faster than I've accepted myself."

"It's all new to me, but people are always stopping by for prayer and counsel, and the shrine confessional is packed to the brim — I just haven't had any time to take everything in. But I know everyone and have spoken on spiritual matters with many crewmen. I guess they've accepted me in ordination faster than I've accepted myself."

"It's all new to me, but people are always stopping by for prayer and counsel, and the shrine confessional is packed to the brim — I just haven't had any time to take everything in. But I know everyone and have spoken on spiritual matters with many crewmen. I guess they've accepted me in ordination faster than I've accepted myself."

languages.text: Für mich ist das alles neu, aber ständig kommen Leute vorbei, um zu beten und sich Rat zu holen, und die Bekenntnisschrein ist randvoll – ich hatte nur noch keine Zeit, alles in mich aufzunehmen. Aber ich kenne jeden und habe mit vielen Crewmitgliedern über spirituelle Dinge gesprochen. Ich denke, sie haben mich schneller als geweiht akzeptiert als ich mich selbst.
languages.original_text: "It's all new to me, but people are always stopping by for prayer and counsel, and the shrine confessional is packed to the brim — I just haven't had any time to take everything in. But I know everyone and have spoken on spiritual matters with many crewmen. I guess they've accepted me in ordination faster than I've accepted myself."

traits.locale_text: Für mich ist das alles neu, aber ständig kommen Leute vorbei, um zu beten und sich Rat zu holen, und die Bekenntnisschrein ist randvoll – ich hatte nur noch keine Zeit, alles in mich aufzunehmen. Aber ich kenne jeden und habe mit vielen Crewmitgliedern über spirituelle Dinge gesprochen. Ich denke, sie haben mich schneller als geweiht akzeptiert als ich mich selbst.

languages.text: «Es todo muy nuevo para mí, pero siempre hay alguien que se deja caer para rezar una oración y pedir consejo, y el altar confesonario suele estar hasta los topes. Lo que pasa es que todavía no me ha dado tiempo de asimilarlo, pero ya conozco a todo el mundo y he hablado con muchos tripulantes sobre cuestiones espirituales. Supongo que han tardado menos que yo mismo en aceptar mi ordenamiento».
languages.original_text: "It's all new to me, but people are always stopping by for prayer and counsel, and the shrine confessional is packed to the brim — I just haven't had any time to take everything in. But I know everyone and have spoken on spiritual matters with many crewmen. I guess they've accepted me in ordination faster than I've accepted myself."

traits.locale_text: «Es todo muy nuevo para mí, pero siempre hay alguien que se deja caer para rezar una oración y pedir consejo, y el altar confesonario suele estar hasta los topes. Lo que pasa es que todavía no me ha dado tiempo de asimilarlo, pero ya conozco a todo el mundo y he hablado con muchos tripulantes sobre cuestiones espirituales. Supongo que han tardado menos que yo mismo en aceptar mi ordenamiento».

languages.text: 「何もかもが新しいのですが、祈りや相談でいつも人が立ち寄り、聖堂の告解室も満員で、すべてを受け入れる時間がないのです。ですがどの人も顔見知りですし、多くのクルーとスピリチュアルな事柄の話はしてきました。私が自分自身を受け入れるよりも早く、彼らがこの職に任命された私を受け入れてくれたのだと思います」
languages.original_text: "It's all new to me, but people are always stopping by for prayer and counsel, and the shrine confessional is packed to the brim — I just haven't had any time to take everything in. But I know everyone and have spoken on spiritual matters with many crewmen. I guess they've accepted me in ordination faster than I've accepted myself."

traits.locale_text: 「何もかもが新しいのですが、祈りや相談でいつも人が立ち寄り、聖堂の告解室も満員で、すべてを受け入れる時間がないのです。ですがどの人も顔見知りですし、多くのクルーとスピリチュアルな事柄の話はしてきました。私が自分自身を受け入れるよりも早く、彼らがこの職に任命された私を受け入れてくれたのだと思います」

languages.text: “对我来说，这一切都是新的，但大家祈祷和告解的脚步却丝毫没有停歇，祭坛附近也到处都是告解的民众。虽然我还没有完全适应，但忏悔的所有人我都认识，也和很多船员谈过了信仰的问题。看来，大家对我的接受程度，比我自己接受新岗位的速度还要快。”
languages.original_text: "It's all new to me, but people are always stopping by for prayer and counsel, and the shrine confessional is packed to the brim — I just haven't had any time to take everything in. But I know everyone and have spoken on spiritual matters with many crewmen. I guess they've accepted me in ordination faster than I've accepted myself."

traits.locale_text: “对我来说，这一切都是新的，但大家祈祷和告解的脚步却丝毫没有停歇，祭坛附近也到处都是告解的民众。虽然我还没有完全适应，但忏悔的所有人我都认识，也和很多船员谈过了信仰的问题。看来，大家对我的接受程度，比我自己接受新岗位的速度还要快。”

languages.text: « Tout ceci est encore nouveau pour moi, mais les gens sont nombreux à venir prier et à demander conseil, de sorte que le confessionnal du sanctuaire est plein à ras bord. Je n'ai pas encore eu le temps de tout enregistrer, mais je connais tout le monde ici et j'ai parlé spiritualité avec bon nombre d'ouvriers. Il faut croire qu'ils ont accepté mon ordination en moins de temps qu'il m'en a fallu pour m'y habituer. »
languages.original_text: "It's all new to me, but people are always stopping by for prayer and counsel, and the shrine confessional is packed to the brim — I just haven't had any time to take everything in. But I know everyone and have spoken on spiritual matters with many crewmen. I guess they've accepted me in ordination faster than I've accepted myself."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ceci est encore nouveau pour moi, mais les gens sont nombreux à venir prier et à demander conseil, de sorte que le confessionnal du sanctuaire est plein à ras bord. Je n'ai pas encore eu le temps de tout enregistrer, mais je connais tout le monde ici et j'ai parlé spiritualité avec bon nombre d'ouvriers. Il faut croire qu'ils ont accepté mon ordination en moins de temps qu'il m'en a fallu pour m'y habituer. »

languages.text: "Bütün bunlar benim için çok yeni ancak insanlar her zaman dua etmek ve danışmanlık almak için uğruyor ve mabedin günah çıkarma kısmı tıklım tıklım. Henüz her şeyi anlayacak kadar zamanım olmadı ama herkesi tanıyorum ve birçok tayfayla manevi konularda konuşma fırsatım oldu. Sanıyorum bu yeni görevimi benden daha hızlı kabullendiler."
languages.original_text: "It's all new to me, but people are always stopping by for prayer and counsel, and the shrine confessional is packed to the brim — I just haven't had any time to take everything in. But I know everyone and have spoken on spiritual matters with many crewmen. I guess they've accepted me in ordination faster than I've accepted myself."
